reviewText: Great for basic art history. My middle school students enjoy learning about artists before we create our own art. The whole set follows the same basic principle.

Anybody looking for an introduction to the Baroque should look elsewhere. The input of the art "experts" in this documentary is contradictory and scattergun, creating more confusion than enlightenment, their manner of presentation is tedious, and the pronunciation of names is often poor, with two (American) commentators unable to pronounce such a simple and important French name as Poussin correctly.
